title: Entertaining Font Animation
content:
I know this was posted a few years back, but I think some of our new Typophiles and others who may not come across it otherwise would enjoy knowing about it:

[**Little Yellow Writing Hood**](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154502/http:/www.strangeattractors.com/LYWH.html) (By StrangeAttractors for FontShop)

Enjoy!

 [‹ Typophiles here who are color synesthetes?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154502/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43732 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font designers & multi year contracts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907154502/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43682 "Go to next forum topic")
author: microspective

comments.content: Just a little missing bit of code. Try it now.
Weird. I checked it after posting and it worked fine. Thanks for the adjustment anyway. : )

It works for me, and it is:
